    • Method Detail

      • addAccountCertificate

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @POST(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/trusted-certificates")
retrofit2.Call<TrustedCertificateResp> addAccountCertificate(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                                                                             @Body
                                                                                                                                                                             TrustedCertificateReq body)
        Upload new trusted certificate. Upload new trusted certificates. **Example:** ``` curl -X POST https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id}/trusted-certificates \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json' \\ -d {\"name\": \"myCert1\", \"description\": \"very important cert\", \"certificate\": \"certificate_data\", \"service\": \"lwm2m\"} ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        body - A trusted certificate object with attributes. Signature is optional. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<TrustedCertificateResp>

      • deleteAccountCertificate

        @DELETE(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/trusted-certificates/{cert_id}")
retrofit2.Call<java.lang.Void> deleteAccountCertificate(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                                  @Path(value="cert_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String certId)
        Delete trusted certificate by ID. Delete the trusted certificate. **Example:** ``` curl -X DELETE https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id}/trusted-certificates/{cert_id} \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        certId - The ID of the trusted certificate to delete. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<Void>

      • getAccountCertificate

        @GET(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/trusted-certificates/{cert_id}")
retrofit2.Call<TrustedCertificateResp> getAccountCertificate(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                                    @Path(value="cert_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String certId)
        Get trusted certificate by ID. Retrieve a trusted certificate by ID. **Example:** ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id}/trusted-certificates/{cert_id} \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        certId - The ID of the trusted certificate to retrieve. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<TrustedCertificateResp>

      • getAllAccountCertificates

        @GET(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/trusted-certificates")
retrofit2.Call<TrustedCertificateRespList> getAllAccountCertificates(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="limit")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Integer limit,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="after")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String after,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="order")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String order,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="include")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String include,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="name__eq")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String nameEq,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="service__eq")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String serviceEq,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="expire__eq")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Integer expireEq,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="device_execution_mode__eq")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Integer deviceExecutionModeEq,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="device_execution_mode__neq")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Integer deviceExecutionModeNeq,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="owner__eq")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String ownerEq,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="enrollment_mode__eq")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Boolean enrollmentModeEq,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="status__eq")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String statusEq,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="issuer__like")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String issuerLike,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="subject__like")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String subjectLike,
                                                                                                                                  @Query(value="valid__eq")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Boolean validEq)
        Get all trusted certificates. Retrieve trusted certificates in an array. **Example:** ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id}/trusted-certificates \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        limit - The number of results to return (2-1000). Default 50. (optional, default to 50)
        after - The entity ID to fetch after the given one. (optional)
        order - Record order based on creation time. Acceptable values: ASC, DESC. Default: ASC. (optional, default to ASC)
        include - Comma-separated additional data to return. Currently supported: total_count. (optional)
        nameEq - Filter for certificate name. (optional)
        serviceEq - Filter for service. (optional)
        expireEq - Filter for expire. (optional)
        deviceExecutionModeEq - Filter for developer certificates. (optional)
        deviceExecutionModeNeq - Filter for not developer certificates. (optional)
        ownerEq - Owner name filter. (optional)
        enrollmentModeEq - Enrollment mode filter. (optional)
        statusEq - Filter for certificate status. (optional)
        issuerLike - Filter for issuer. Finds all matches where the filter value is a case-insensitive substring of the result. Example: issuer__like=cn=iss matches CN=issuer. (optional)
        subjectLike - Filter for subject. Finds all matches where the filter value is a case-insensitive substring of the result. Example: subject__like=cn=su matches CN=subject. (optional)
        validEq - Filter for finding certificates by validity. True returns certificates which are not yet expired. False returns certificates which have expired. (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<TrustedCertificateRespList>

      • updateAccountCertificate

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @PUT(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/trusted-certificates/{cert_id}")
retrofit2.Call<TrustedCertificateResp> updateAccountCertificate(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                                                                                         @Path(value="cert_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String certId,
                                                                                                                                                                                         @Body
                                                                                                                                                                                         TrustedCertificateUpdateReq body)
        Update trusted certificate. Update existing trusted certificates. **Example:** ``` curl -X PUT https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id}/trusted-certificates/{cert_id} \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json' \\ -d {\"description\": \"very important cert\"} ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        certId - The ID of the trusted certificate to update. (required)
        body - A trusted certificate object with attributes. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<TrustedCertificateResp>
